name: Mr. GLAD
description:
This is a game that I made a good while ago, some 4 months ago. I didn't know what to do with it, so I uploaded it to the public.

So to the game! Fight enemies in a arena, and try to survive as long as you can, and get the most kills you can! Customize your fighter, mostly with shirts, because there's only one hat. Have fun fighting.

P.S. The game probarly won't get updated, but I would appreciate that, if you would leave some feedback. So my game dev future would become better. Have fun!

Use WASD to move around and the Spacebar to swing the sword.
